results.content:
The idea of the course is brilliant, but the instructor didn't know how to take advantage of that.

Instead of TEACHING (describing what he is doing and SPEAKING to the students), there is only a video showing his job and a damn annoying song playing on the background (I had to watch ALL the videos in MUTE)... 

WHY DON'T SPEAK TO THE CLASS??

I COULD LEARN MUCH MORE ON OTHER STREAMS SITES, FOR FREE...

PS. : It IS possible to get a few info from this course, but compared to the idea/content of the course and how it was presented, it is a waste of money. Unfortunately.

The course idea is GREAT but should be taught properly.
